sections.title: Our Story
sections.content: Founded in 2024, Paws Plays Gameroom has quickly become Northeastern University's premier gaming destination. Located in the heart of Curry Student Center, we provide students with a state-of-the-art gaming experience.

sections.title: Our Mission
sections.content: We're dedicated to creating an inclusive gaming community where students can relax, compete, and connect. Whether you're a casual player or a competitive gamer, there's a place for you here.

sections.title: What We Offer
sections.content: Our facility features the latest gaming consoles including PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, and Nintendo Switch, along with high-performance gaming PCs. We host regular tournaments, game nights, and special events throughout the semester.
